title: Wes Streeting criticises ‘shortsighted’ drug firms for rejecting pricing offer
description: Exclusive: Health secretary says he will not let patients be ‘ripped off’ by pharmaceutical companies amid standoff
content:
Wes Streeting has intensified his battle with drug companies over the price of their products, saying he will not let the industry rip off British patients or taxpayers by signing up to their demands.

title: Mushroom murderer Erin Patterson left me 'half alive', sole survivor says
description: Ian Wilkinson was speaking at the pre-sentencing hearing for Erin Patterson, who was convicted of murdering Mr Wilkinson's wife, Heather, her sister Gail Patterson, and Gail's husband Don with a toxic lunch in July 2023.
content:
The sole surviving guest of a lunch where three others died after being served food laced with toxic mushrooms has told an Australian court that the actions of murderer Erin Patterson have left him feeling "half alive".

title: Ocado worst for plastic bags as total single-use sales rise for first time
description: Shoppers in England bought 437m carrier bags last year as online food shops replace supermarket trips
content:
Plastic bag sales have risen for the first time in 10 years on the back of the so-called Ocado effect as online food shops and ultra-fast deliveries replace supermarket trips.
Shoppers in England bought 437m single-use plastic carrier bags last year,... [2896 chars]

title: France summons US envoy Charles Kushner over antisemitism claims
description: France denies allegations it is failing to tackle a surge in antisemitism since the Gaza war began.
content:

title: Epstein accuser Virginia Giuffre’s memoir to be published posthumously
description: Nobody’s Girl, which Giuffre had been working on before her death, is set to be released this autumn
content:
The posthumous memoir of Virginia Giuffre, one of Jeffrey Epstein’s most prominent accusers, will be published in the autumn, a publisher has announced.
